title: Publish
description: Describe the important features of your smart application to make it more discoverable and catch the interest of smart wallet users.
warning: Publishing into a test network first is strongly recommended. Please familiarize yourself with [the market](https://oceanprotocol.com/technology/marketplaces), [the risks](https://blog.oceanprotocol.com/on-staking-on-data-in-ocean-market-3d8e09eb0a13), and the [Terms of Use](/terms).
tooltipAvailableNetworks: Smart Applications are published to the network your wallet is connected to. These networks are currently supported:
